```{r setup}
set.seed(1126490984)
library(TumorGenerator)
```

```{r}
out <- simulateTumor(N = 250000, verbose = F)
visualizeTumor(out, background = "white")
rgl::rglwidget() 
visualizeTumor(out, background = "white", plot.type = "heat") 
rgl::rglwidget()
```
